speaker: Archmage
lines: You stand before the archmage at the college gate.
He asks why you have come: power, knowledge, or balance?
He tells you the work is hard and the lessons are earned.
He says every new mage answers a question first.
When the hall is quiet and only the Weave answers, what do you ask?

choices.text: Grant me power enough to bend the storm.
Show me the hidden name beneath all names.
Teach me balance, that I might wield without ruin.
